attributes.action: Suarez to be banned from football
attributes.additional_details:
Suarez is in the public eye, children look up to him but yet he is being allowed to get away with biting other players!!  Now to me that is assault and shouldn't be Allowed to get away with it.  If you think he should be banned from playing football please sign here.

Football is a sport and shouldn't contain acts of violence like that.  He gets paid thousands and has all them luxuries while there are servicemen risking their lives to give people like him a safe life but he does that!!!! Sack him
